venue.name: Wesleyan Univ. Fayerweather Bldg., Beckham Hall

item.description:
Free Contra dance at Wesleyan (donations accepted) 8-11pm.

For those who have been to the Bethany dance, from what I understand this will be more of a "real" Contra dance...more room, a little more complex/challenging. But don't worry, if you can walk, and follow instructions, you should be able to handle it.

These dances are open to the public, there will likely be a wide age range.

If you're a "Maybe" please say so in your RSVP

Contra dancing is a "called" social folk dance descended from English and French country dancing. You will randomly pair up with people and constantly change partners all night. No experience needed, they walk you through what you need to do.

HOST: Jason, cell # in my RSVP.Â  Texting is fine
item.how_to_find_us: Find Beckham Hall, then call or text me
item.name: Fri 5/4 - Free Wesleyan University Contra dance
